title: How well will this computer run League?
body:
Getting this computer for Cyber Monday, how well would it run League of Legends (and other games)?

Processor: AMD A6-7310 APU with Radeon™ R4 Graphics
Operating System: Windows 10 Home 64bit English
Memoryi: 6GB Dual Channel DDR3L 1600MHz (4GBx1 + 2GBx1)
Hard Drive: 1TB 7200 rpm SATA 6Gb/s Hard Drive
Video Cardi: Integrated Graphics with AMD APU
